title: Lower Back Pain
content:
Stretching exercises for lower back pain:

1. Knee-to-chest stretch: Lie on your back, bring one knee to your chest, hold for 15-30 seconds, repeat with other leg.

2. Cat-cow stretch: Get on hands and knees, arch your back up (cat), then drop it down (cow), repeat 10 times.

3. Child's pose: Kneel and sit back on your heels, reach forward with your arms, hold for 30 seconds.

Perform these stretches daily for best results.
